Title: Requires motorcycle user to wear helmets that meet the requirements of the US department of transportation
Summary: Requires motorcycle users to wear helmets that meet the federal motor vehicle safety standards and which have been impact-tested by the U.S. department of transportation, the commissioner of motor vehicles or by an independent laboratory approved by the commissioner of motor vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง381, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to motorcycle protective helmet safety standards
